name: Computer vs Human Tennis
description:
Computer vs Human Tennis

Use the thumb of your right hand to move the racquet on the right side. Touch the ball to serve. The racquet cannot move ahead of the Service Line towards the net. The racquet can be moved by touching a position on the screen or by dragging it. Touch the ball at a angle with the shape of the racquet to hit it. The point is played according to the rule which is the ball should cross the net line and cross the screen boundary. Ten points wins the game.

Should be played on mobile phone.
